fields.name: LeChuck
fields.description: Capitán pirata y muerto viviente a jornada completa, pronto el marido de Elaine Marley.

fields.name: Otis
fields.description: Pirata de mal aliento encarcelado en la cárcel de Isla Mêlée.

fields.name: Carla
fields.description: Maestra de la Espada de Isla Mêlée.

fields.name: Elaine Marley
fields.description: Gobernadora del Área de las Tres Islas, entre ellas la Isla Mêleé, al ser la única candidata que se presentó al puesto.

fields.insult: This is the END for you, you gutter crawling cur!
fields.comeback: And I've got a little TIP for you, get the POINT?

fields.insult: I've spoken with apes more polite than you!
fields.comeback: I'm glad to hear you attended your family reunion!

fields.insult: Soon you'll be wearing my sword like a shish kebab!
fields.comeback: First you'd better stop waving it like a feather duster.

fields.insult: People fall at my feet when they see me coming!
fields.comeback: Even BEFORE they smell your breath?

fields.insult: you fight like a dairy farmer!
fields.comeback: How appropriate. You fight like a cow!
